title.rendered: STEDI 40 WATT LED WORK FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
40w LED Flood Light

SMOOTH BEAM

Powered by 4 x 10w CREE XM-L2 LEDs, the 40w LED Work Lights diffused beam offers an even, dispersed beam to provide strong visibility and no hot spot. Its small size will also allow installation for tight applications.

SHOCK PROTECTED

Coming Soon. Following the lines of the other heavy-duty lights in our range, the 40w is also built with shock dampeners between the light and lower bracket to help it with the constant abuse from some of the harshest environments.

APPLICATION

Although designed with the intent of a heavy work field, its compact size allows it to be mounted to just about anything. Equipped with a U-Bracket to make installation a breeze.

DETAILS

Heavy Duty 40W CREE LED Work Light.

  • 10W XM-L2 CREE™ LED
  • Optical Hardened PC Lens
  • 24 Month Warrany
  • Stainless Steel U Bracket with 10mm fastener
  • Envionmentally Sealed Deutsch® DT-2 Connectors

Dimensions – Height 150mm | Width 125mm | Depth 86mm ( Height includes lower mount bracket)

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 40 Watts
LED 4 x 10 Watt CREE XM-L2
CURRENT DRAW 3.3A @ 12v, 1.6A @ 24v
VOLTAGE 9 to 32v
RAW LUMEN 4,208LM
INGRESS PROTECTION IP67
COLOUR TEMP 6000k
LIFESPAN 50,000hrs
LENS Harden Optical PC
WEIGHT 1.3kg
BEAM Wide Flood

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 40 WATT LED WORK LIGHT
  • Required Nuts & Bolts
  • Sealed Deutsch Connectors (Male & Female)

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
